extendedInfo.description: Search the catalog, place holds, renew materials, see new books, movies and music, follow our blogs, check out our events, locate our libraries, get in touch with us and much more. Featuring simplified access to Overdrive eBooks and eAudiobooks. Also use BookLook to scan ISBN codes and find out if the item is owned by and SMCL library. Plus a great new way to search on mobile devices: just type the first couple of letters of search words. To search for 'Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis' simply type 'ja ke on'.Available FREE in app stores now!
